hotels.title: Malolo Island Adults-Only Tropical Paradise in Fiji
hotels.description: Experience a secluded island escape at the adults-only Tropica Island Resort. Boasting lush tropical gardens, a beachfront infinity pool and uninterrupted views of the sparkling Pacific Ocean, Tropica Island Resort allows you to completely unwind. Step from the comfort of your luxurious bure onto the white-sand beach, where you can enjoy an array of water-based activities, including snorkelling and kayaking, or indulge in a restorative treatment at Tropica Day Spa, before dining under the stars at Lakalaka Restaurant & Bar.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Fiji Adults-Only Retreat on Malolo Island in the Mamanuca Archipelago
hotels.description: Discover Fiji’s only overwater bures - exclusively at Likuliku Lagoon Resort - where barefoot luxury meets the shimmering turquoise of the South Pacific. Designed exclusively for adults, this sanctuary is crafted with couples in mind, offering uninterrupted ocean views, direct lagoon access and the perfect setting for romance. Just a short boat ride from the mainland, but worlds away in atmosphere, this award-winning resort is nestled on the edge of a crystal-clear lagoon, within a protected marine sanctuary. Every detail is rooted in sustainability, from a native tree planting program to its efforts in protecting the critically endangered Fijian crested iguana. Spend your days soaking up the sun by the infinity pool, surrendering to blissful treatments at Tatadra Spa or indulging in ever-changing culinary delights at Fijana Restaurant.

hotels.title: Family-Friendly Fiji Bure Hideaway with Three Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Escape the everyday to a Fijian paradise at Malolo Island Resort, an island haven 100% owned by a local Fijian family, where the primary focus is reconnecting with loved ones among the tropical treasures of the South Pacific. To preserve the pristine beaches, colourful coral reefs and swaying coconut palms that surround the gorgeous bures, the property place heavy importance on sustainable tourism by implementing conservation efforts across the resort. After relaxing among the spotless scenery, taste the island's flavours at the resort's restaurants, sip tropical cocktails at Beach Bar, or spend the evening at a private beach dinner after dropping the little ones at the onsite Kids' Club.

hotels.title: Fiji Five-Star Six Senses Serenity in the Mamanuca Archipelago
hotels.description: Escape to Six Senses Fiji, where romance, luxury and relaxed tropical living combine for an escape like no other in the South Pacific. Perched on powder-white shores on Malolo Island in the Mamanuca archipelago, this award-winning resort is a short boat ride from Fiji’s capital, but a world away from everything else. The resort puts sustainability at the forefront - it creates its own energy, grows its own organic produce, and has invested in the repopulation and protection of the critically endangered Fijian crested iguana through a successful captive breeding program. The luxury resort combines the very best in Fijian design with contemporary features, creating effortlessly elegant spaces you’ll never want to leave.
